title: Financial News - Is Crypto Here to Stay on Wall Street?
description: Financial News' Trista Kelley speaks to Umar Farooq, head of J.P. Morgan’s Onyx unit that focuses on blockchain and digital assets. They discuss the evolution of crypto at J.P. Morgan, the biggest American bank; how 'smart money' investors approach crypto in their portfolios; and how regular investors can follow suit.
